block.p: Elizabeth Lara Eitches, the daughter of Sue-Ann Eitches and Dr. Alex Eitches of New City, N.Y., was married last evening to Marc David Weshler, the son of Susan and Benjamin Weshler of Old Westbury, N.Y. Rabbi Joseph Potasnik officiated at the Mark Hotel in Manhattan.

Mrs. Weshler, 27, graduated from Arizona State University at Tempe and received a master's degree in special education from New York University. She is a special education teacher at the Gillen Brewer School in Manhattan. Her father is a partner in ELK Dental Associates and the chief of prosthodontics at Mount Sinai Medical Center, both in Manhattan. Her mother is a professor of nursing at Rockland Community College in Suffern, N.Y.

Elizabeth Lara Eitches, the daughter of Sue-Ann Eitches and Dr. Alex Eitches of New City, N.Y., was married last evening to Marc David Weshler, the son of Susan and Benjamin Weshler of Old Westbury, N.Y. Rabbi Joseph Potasnik officiated at the Mark Hotel in Manhattan.

Mrs. Weshler, 27, graduated from Arizona State University at Tempe and received a master's degree in special education from New York University. She is a special education teacher at the Gillen Brewer School in Manhattan. Her father is a partner in ELK Dental Associates and the chief of prosthodontics at Mount Sinai Medical Center, both in Manhattan. Her mother is a professor of nursing at Rockland Community College in Suffern, N.Y.

Mr. Weshler, 29, graduated from Ithaca College and received an M.B.A. from Hofstra University. He is the director of new business development at Display Systems Inc., a company in Maspeth, Queens, that designs and manufactures store fixtures and displays. His father is the company's president. The bridegroom's mother is the board vice president for the Mental Health Association of Nassau County in Hempstead, N.Y.
